column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This restaurant in Lincoln Park is definitely nicer than any tapas places in the Loop. Great atmosphere
column3: and a great spot for brunch or dinner. A large selection of tapas and its known for its Sangria
column4: which was delicious. We had the shrimp with garlic
column9: but delicious. Definitely order a few dishes and then you can split them among yourselves since some are larger than others.
